questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters' Board of Directors thinks that sales user adoption should be calculated by the number of daily logins.
Which two measures of sales user adoption should be considered when implementing Sales Cloud? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Number of reports exported to Excel for analysis
choices.C: Completeness of records entered into the new system
choices.B: Number of neglected opportunities over time by role
choices.D: Overall effectiveness of mass email campaigns

questions.question_text:
The admin at Universal Containers has been getting complaints from sales reps about duplicate Leads within Salesforce. The admin has already set up a matching rule for Leads.

What should the consultant recommend to resolve the issue?

choices.B: Confirm the custom matching rule is activated.
choices.D: Confirm the standard match ng rule is inactivated.
choices.C: Change the criteria for the standard Lead matching rule.
choices.A: Change the criteria for the standard Contact matching rule.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
standard matching rule cant be updated

Selected Answer: B
B is it
I don't think you can change the criteria of a standard matching rule, only create a custom rule, so it's B.

choices.D: Run the updated assignment rules in the Planning State and view the accounts on the territory detail page.
choices.A: Use Tableau to geocode account addresses and display on a territory map.
choices.C: Install the Territory Management Reporting Pack from the AppExchange.
choices.B: Use Data Loader to export the accounts and make updates in Google Sheets.

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers continues to see substantial growth year-over-year. Outside sales reps think their territories are too dense to cover adequately. Leadership has decided to modify the existing sales territories and hire additional staff to make the account allocations more manageable. Some states will change from one territory to two or more smaller territories. In these instances, accounts will need to be reassigned to new territories.

Sales operations wants to review the territory account assignments and verify the accuracy before the changes are reflected m Sales Cloud.

How should the consultant show sales operations what the data will look like after the change?

Users at Cloud Kicks (CK) say the global search is returning too many results when searching for contacts. CK’s admin confirmed that users have the correct permissions and record access for the contacts they want to see.

What should a consultant recommend to yield better search results?

choices.B: Add company name next to contact’s full name in the search window.
choices.C: Add LIKE keyword next to contact s full name in the search window.
choices.D: Use parentheses operator to limit search to the Contacts object.
choices.A: Use quotation marks operator around contact's first and last name.

choices.B: Dynamic dashboards allow all users to view data as any user.
choices.C: Dynamic dashboards must be saved m public or shared folders.
choices.A: Dynamic dashboards must be manually refreshed.
choices.D: Dynamic dashboards require users to follow each component.

questions.question_text: Which two considerations should be made when deploying dynamic dashboards? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
not required to follow each component

Selected Answer: AC
AC is it

Selected Answer: AC
A, C right answers
